subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As the Angels prepared to celebrate their fourth A.L. West crown in five seasons after their victory Wednesday, the Yankees trudged home for an awkward 10-game sendoff to proud old Yankee Stadium.
snippet: As the Angels prepared to celebrate their fourth A.L. West crown in five seasons after their victory Wednesday, the Yankees trudged home for an awkward 10-game sendoff to proud old Yankee Stadium.
